title: Rocket League sales revenue worldwide 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Month June 2016 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and December 2015 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 40.0.

Month June 2016 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and December 2015 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.

Month June 2016 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and December 2015 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 2 number of Months.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
The highest Month June 2016 has 40.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month December 2015.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars has lowered over the past 2 Months.
Considered together, the average Revenue in million U.S. dollars in all 2 Months is roughly 90.0.
